snippet.title: The Plucky Squire | Gameplay Trailer | Coming 2023
snippet.description:
Coming to PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series S/X, and Nintendo Switch later this year. 

In this imaginative action adventure game, lovable hero Jot can leap seamlessly from the 2D pages of a book into a 3D world. You can see this in action for yourself in the new trailer, which focuses on the many different ways to play the game: from 3D platforming to top-down dungeon crawling.

Visit https://thepluckysquire.com/ for more information.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

The Plucky Squire on Steam ➟ https://store.steampowered.com/app/1627570/The_Plucky_Squire/
